title: Elegant, spacious, 4 room apt.
posting_body: Edwardian building with spacious living, dining and bedroom with hardwood floors throughout.
Approximately 1000 square feet.
Kitchen with tile floors and tile counters, gas stove with hood, fridge, microwave.
Recently (right now) remodeled kitchen and bathroom not yet reflected in photos.
New ones will be taken this weekend.
Backdoor exit through pantry and kitchen.
Hall and large bedroom closets as well as very, very large walk-in closet.
Full bathroom.
Built-in bookshelves in living room, surrounding functioning tile fireplace.
All windows have blinds.
Small office space/pantry.
Apartment overlooks garden for privacy and quiet (and often parrots).
No windows or street vantage points see into apt.
Access to / use of building garden with gate to Leroy Place.
Central heating, water and garbage included.
Street parking only, with neighborhood sticker available and private garages nearby.
On the very top of Nob Hill, near 1 Cal and 27 Bryant MUNI lines.
One block from the Cable Car line.
A short walk to Chinatown, Financial District, Shopping District, Polk Street
Viewing this Satuday,m August 6
Call for appointment
show contact info
, no text
No smoking.
Cats/dogs okay.
Rent control.
